SEARCH
Package org.cst8288Lab2.parser

Class PropertiesParser

java.lang.Object
org.cst8288Lab2.parser.PropertiesParser
public class PropertiesParser extends Object
This Singleton class parses database connection strings from a properties file. It then maps each value to the correct kind of connection String
Version:
Java 17
Author:
Dan Blais
